name: Supper Banana
description:
Supper Banana is the first game I ever made (2016?). And now it's available on itchio. And it's remastered.

The Evil Eater wants to eat you. You must reach the treasure chest to escape.

Features:

  • 3 levels
  • Crazy scientists and moonwalk guys
  • A hamburger
  • It's really short (and epic(?))

In this remastered version:

  • Fixed some of the most horrible bugs.
  • Fixed grammar mistakes.
  • Removed highscores (they didn't work).
  • Jump strength reduced.
  • Changed music (the original couldn't be found).

Originally made with GameMaker, then edited with GameMaker Studio.
